metadata.title: CVE-2022-2163 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Cast UI and Toolbar in Google Chrome prior to103.0.5060.134 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to potentially exploit heap corruption via UIinteraction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
